gov.ca.water.calgui.bus_service

Interface IDynamicControlSvc

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicControlSvcImpl

    public interface IDynamicControlSvc
    This is the interface for applying the dynamic controls like enabling, disabling etc.
    Author:
    Mohan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doDynamicControl(java.lang.String itemName, boolean isSelected, boolean isEnabled, org.swixml.SwingEngine swingEngine)
      This will apply all the dynamic controls which are from these two files.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLabelAndGuiLinks4BOBasedOnTheRadioButtons(org.swixml.SwingEngine swingEngine)
      This method is used to decide what is the lookup value for Gui_Link4 and the label for the Operations tab.

      This will return the first TriggerBO object for the given id.
      boolean isPreventRoeTrigger()
      This is used to prevent the ItemListener.

      This method is used for making components enabling and disabling the component and it's children.
      void toggleVisComponentAndChildren(java.awt.Component component, java.lang.Boolean isVisible)

    • Method Detail

      • doDynamicControl

        void doDynamicControl(java.lang.String itemName,
                      boolean isSelected,
                      boolean isEnabled,
                      org.swixml.SwingEngine swingEngine)
        This will apply all the dynamic controls which are from these two files. 
         1. TriggerForDymanicSelection.table
 2. TriggerForDynamicDisplay.table
        Parameters:
        itemName - The item name
        isSelected - Whether it is selected or not.
        isEnabled - Whether it is enabled or not.
        swingEngine - The object of the GUI.

      • getTriggerBOById

        TriggerBO getTriggerBOById(java.lang.String id)
        This will return the first TriggerBO object for the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the trigger.
        Returns:
        Will return the first TriggerBO object for the given id.

      • toggleVisComponentAndChildren

        void toggleVisComponentAndChildren(java.awt.Component component,
                                   java.lang.Boolean isVisible)
        This method is used for making components visible or non-visible and it's children.
        Parameters:
        component - The component.
        isVisible - value to be set.

      • toggleEnComponentAndChildren

        void toggleEnComponentAndChildren(java.awt.Component component,
                                  boolean isEnable)
        This method is used for making components enabling and disabling the component and it's children.
        Parameters:
        component - The component.
        isEnable - to enable or not.

      • getLabelAndGuiLinks4BOBasedOnTheRadioButtons

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLabelAndGuiLinks4BOBasedOnTheRadioButtons(org.swixml.SwingEngine swingEngine)
        This method is used to decide what is the lookup value for Gui_Link4 and the label for the Operations tab. This will return the list of strings in which the 1st is the lookup value and the 2nd is the label.
        Parameters:
        swingEngine - The object of the GUI.
        Returns:
        Will return the list of strings in which the 1st is the lookup value and the 2nd is the label.

      • isPreventRoeTrigger

        boolean isPreventRoeTrigger()
        This is used to prevent the ItemListener.
        Returns:
        Will return the roe trigger value.
